name: Flying the British Airways Airbus A380: London to Boston in Economy Class
description:
Here's my trip report from my flight from London to Boston with British Airways in World Traveller / economy class, onboard the Airbus A380 onboard flight BA213 from London to Boston.  This is one of BA's shorter A380 routes, allowing us to sample BA's wonderful service and aircraft on a sub-6 hour flight.

WATCH THIS FLIGHT IN FULL LENGTH: BECOME A SUPPORTER - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2O6HDtMOZf9FkUAepz9Atg/join
